items.title: Master thesis project
items.text:
| 06/2024-10/2024

My work was in collaboration project with Ville Mustonen and Melina Markkanen to study waste water microbial methylation patterns for my master thesis. I did analysis on methylation data and trained Random forest model to classify bacterial species from waste water samples. My work was used as part of scientific publication.

TOOLS: python

items.title: Research Assistant
items.text:
Folkhälsan reseach institute | 01/2023 - 12/2024

As a research assistant, I conducted downstream analysis of sequencing data, statical analyses and developed automated pipelines for robust, reproducible workflows. I managed large-scale data storage systems in CSC Allas. My role also involved leveraging batch processing using CSC to handle high-throughput computational tasks, such as sequence alignment of long read sequencing data and variant calling, optimizing workflows for sequencing data from multiple patients. Additionally, I collaborated with multidisciplinary team which included doctors and biologist from varying fields to integrate bioinformatics solutions into research projects in the biomedical field.

TOOLS: python, slurm, csc, bash

items.title: Software Testing
items.text:
FISION OY | 09/2021-02/2022

I worked part time in a software development company as a GUI tester. The main focus of my work was on user interface testing and documentation but I was also learning about the software development of the system.

Download PDF

items.title: KAMK Engineering studies
items.text:
My engineering studies focuse on artificial intelligence, data science, and modern software development, while building on a strong foundation in mathematics and natural sciences. The comprehensive curriculum combined theoretical knowledge with practical application through project-based learning.

Study modules:

Mathematics and Natural Sciences

Established a solid foundation in statistical mathematics and probability theory, essential for data processing and analysis in ICT engineering applications.

Programming and Software Development – Gained proficiency in multiple programming languages and modern software development methodologies. Developed skills in defining, designing, implementing, testing, and documenting software using various tools and agile development practices. Participated in collaborative technology workshops, working in teams to deliver project outcomes. Data Management – Acquired comprehensive knowledge of the entire data processing pipeline, including data collection, transformation, analysis, and visualization. Studied data security solutions and ethical considerations in data handling, applying this knowledge in AI application projects. Machine Learning and Data Analytics – Developed expertise in machine learning theory, techniques, and tools, with practical application in solving real-world problems. Gained understanding of how data analytics drives business decision-making and created machine learning applications in project work. Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning – Specialized in advanced AI topics including deep learning, natural language processing, and digital signal processing. Enhanced expertise through industry expert lectures and professional events, culminating in an applied AI project demonstrating practical implementation skills.
